channel.title: Add new item to demonik
channel.description:
Ok, Well im trying to figure out how to add a new item to demonik :\ So far i was able to test it on ''boots'' and edit colour, so i had my regular black boots, aswell as my pink boots. At first i wasnt able to wear them, edited abit more, and i can wear them, but all is i cant see them on my feet, just my regular brown shoes appear, this is what i edited so far.
the items.dmk .xml file, item 1290 being the new ''pink'' boots.
[code] <ItemDef> <!-- 1289--> <name>Scythe</name> <command></command> <stackable>false</stackable> <members>false</members> <special>1</special> <basePrice>15</basePrice> <wieldable>8216</wieldable> <description>Get another from the clothes shop if you die</description> <invPic>434</invPic> <mask>0</mask> </ItemDef> <ItemDef> <!-- 1290--> <name>Boots</name> <command></command> <stackable>false</stackable> <members>false</members> <special>0</special> <basePrice>6</basePrice> <wieldable>512</wieldable> <description>Comfortable leather boots</description> <invPic>16</invPic> <mask>16711748</mask> </ItemDef> </ItemDef-array>[/code]
The animation.dmk .xml file, Again boots being the new ''pink'' boots.
[code] <AnimationDef> <name>Scythe</name> <colour>0</colour> <gender>0</gender> <hasA>true</hasA> <hasF>false</hasF> <number>1647</number> </AnimationDef> <AnimationDef> <name>boots</name> <colour>16711748</colour> <gender>0</gender> <hasA>true</hasA> <hasF>false</hasF> <number>270</number> </AnimationDef> </AnimationDef-array>[/code]
Now for the demonik src files. conf/def/itemdef.xml
[code] <ItemDef> <!-- 1289--> <name>Scythe</name> <command></command> <stackable>false</stackable> <members>false</members> <special>1</special> <basePrice>15</basePrice> <wieldable>8216</wieldable> <description>Admin only item.</description> <invPic>434</invPic> <mask>0</mask> </ItemDef> <ItemDef> <!-- 17--> <name>Boots</name> <command></command> <stackable>false</stackable> <members>false</members> <special>0</special> <basePrice>6</basePrice> <wieldable>512</wieldable> <description>Comfortable leather boots</description> <invPic>16</invPic> <mask>16711748</mask> </ItemDef> </ItemDef-array>[/code]
then the conf/def/extras/itemwieldabledef.xml
[code] <entry> <int>1289</int> <ItemWieldableDef> <sprite>229</sprite> <type>8216</type> <wieldPos>4</wieldPos> <armourPoints>200</armourPoints> <weaponAimPoints>100</weaponAimPoints> <weaponPowerPoints>100</weaponPowerPoints> <magicPoints>50</magicPoints> <prayerPoints>0</prayerPoints> <rangePoints>0</rangePoints> <requiredStats> <entry> <int>0</int> <int>90</int> </entry> <entry> <int>1</int> <int>90</int> </entry> <entry> <int>6</int> <int>90</int> </entry> </requiredStats> <femaleOnly>false</femaleOnly> </ItemWieldableDef> </entry> <entry> <int>1290</int> <ItemWieldableDef> <sprite>12</sprite> <type>512</type> <wieldPos>9</wieldPos> <armourPoints>2</armourPoints> <weaponAimPoints>0</weaponAimPoints> <weaponPowerPoints>0</weaponPowerPoints> <magicPoints>0</magicPoints> <prayerPoints>0</prayerPoints> <rangePoints>0</rangePoints> <requiredStats> </requiredStats> <femaleOnly>false</femaleOnly> </ItemWieldableDef> </entry> </map>[/code]
Thats what i got so far, ive just no idea why there not appearing on my feet.
Any ideas please? Thank you :)

item.title: Add new item to demonik
item.dc:creator: @Shob Shob
item.description:
@Shob wrote:

does this have anything to do with a sprite? I would think so eh? or maby not…

item.title: Add new item to demonik
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

Ok, Well im trying to figure out how to add a new item to demonik :\ So far i was able to test it on ‘‘boots’’ and edit colour, so i had my regular black boots, aswell as my pink boots. At first i wasnt able to wear them, edited abit more, and i can wear them, but all is i cant see them on my feet, just my regular brown shoes appear, this is what i edited so far.

the items.dmk .xml file, item 1290 being the new ‘‘pink’’ boots.

<ItemDef> <!-- 1289--> <name>Scythe</name> <command></command> <stackable>false</stackable> <members>false</members> <special>1</special> <basePrice>15</basePrice> <wieldable>8216</wieldable> <description>Get another from the clothes shop if you die</description> <invPic>434</invPic> <mask>0</mask> </ItemDef> <ItemDef> <!-- 1290--> <name>Boots</name> <command></command> <stackable>false</stackable> <members>false</members> <special>0</special> <basePrice>6</basePrice> <wieldable>512</wieldable> <description>Comfortable leather boots</description> <invPic>16</invPic> <mask>16711748</mask> </ItemDef> </ItemDef-array>

The animation.dmk .xml file, Again boots being the new ‘‘pink’’ boots.

<AnimationDef> <name>Scythe</name> <colour>0</colour> <gender>0</gender> <hasA>true</hasA> <hasF>false</hasF> <number>1647</number> </AnimationDef> <AnimationDef> <name>boots</name> <colour>16711748</colour> <gender>0</gender> <hasA>true</hasA> <hasF>false</hasF> <number>270</number> </AnimationDef> </AnimationDef-array>

Now for the demonik src files. conf/def/itemdef.xml

<ItemDef> <!-- 1289--> <name>Scythe</name> <command></command> <stackable>false</stackable> <members>false</members> <special>1</special> <basePrice>15</basePrice> <wieldable>8216</wieldable> <description>Admin only item.</description> <invPic>434</invPic> <mask>0</mask> </ItemDef> <ItemDef> <!-- 17--> <name>Boots</name> <command></command> <stackable>false</stackable> <members>false</members> <special>0</special> <basePrice>6</basePrice> <wieldable>512</wieldable> <description>Comfortable leather boots</description> <invPic>16</invPic> <mask>16711748</mask> </ItemDef> </ItemDef-array>

then the conf/def/extras/itemwieldabledef.xml

<entry> <int>1289</int> <ItemWieldableDef> <sprite>229</sprite> <type>8216</type> <wieldPos>4</wieldPos> <armourPoints>200</armourPoints> <weaponAimPoints>100</weaponAimPoints> <weaponPowerPoints>100</weaponPowerPoints> <magicPoints>50</magicPoints> <prayerPoints>0</prayerPoints> <rangePoints>0</rangePoints> <requiredStats> <entry> <int>0</int> <int>90</int> </entry> <entry> <int>1</int> <int>90</int> </entry> <entry> <int>6</int> <int>90</int> </entry> </requiredStats> <femaleOnly>false</femaleOnly> </ItemWieldableDef> </entry> <entry> <int>1290</int> <ItemWieldableDef> <sprite>12</sprite> <type>512</type> <wieldPos>9</wieldPos> <armourPoints>2</armourPoints> <weaponAimPoints>0</weaponAimPoints> <weaponPowerPoints>0</weaponPowerPoints> <magicPoints>0</magicPoints> <prayerPoints>0</prayerPoints> <rangePoints>0</rangePoints> <requiredStats> </requiredStats> <femaleOnly>false</femaleOnly> </ItemWieldableDef> </entry> </map>

Thats what i got so far, ive just no idea why there not appearing on my feet.

Any ideas please? Thank you
